post.author: Admin
post.title: NRMB Newsletter – January 30, 2017
post.description:
Cancelled: Band Booster meeting tonight – jan 30 @ 7pm media center
Open chairposition: Fruit Sale
post.content:
Canceled: Band Booster meeting tonight – Jan 30 @ 7pm media center

Open chairposition:

Fruit Sale Chairpeople (2) Needed: contact: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com

DATES you need to know:

  • JANUARY 30 – Band Booster Meeting 7pm in Media Center -- canceled due to school closing
  • Feb 8 – HS/MS Jazz Band Concert
  • Feb 11 – OMEA Solo / Ensemble Event – Tri C West

Senior Scholarship Committee

Thank you to the parents who volunteered to read the senior essays!

OPEN Chairposition

As mentioned above, we are in need of TWO people to chair our Fruit Sale next year. I can honestly say that I have worked with Susie and Karen this year and these gals have TOTALLY organized this committee and have fantastic notes for you to follow for next year.

Consider volunteering NOW since both Karen and Susie are available to go over everything with you for next year! Call Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 or Susie Perez 440-877-1299 if you are interested in volunteering. It is a FUN committee!!

Mark Your Calendar - Basket Raffle

Our annual Basket Raffle event will be MAY 6th and 3Spot in North Royalton. The 3Spot will be giving us the MAIN DINING room for our event this year! So mark your calendar and we will be getting more information out soon.
